title: launching lol leading to bugsplat-------<<<<!!!HELP!!!!
body: I have been having problem initially it was stuck at 33% , latter when i reinstalled it was stuck at 99%....now when i reinstalled it , launching it now leading me to bugsplat..."""""""HELP"""""i want to play ....

replies.body:
Hi Targons Blade,
Thank you for yours response,
i went through the Bugslat Guide, 
1. I reinstalled my entire setup.
2. Run the lol.launcher.adim, so didnt got the bugsplat report this time.
3.but it still stuck at 33, 40, 51 % and was getting Error:unspecified.
4. I tried copying S_OK file from RADS>Projects>lol_patcher into all the release in the RAD>Project folders it worked wonder  , I was able to install upto         99% this time over 7 hours...it stuck now on 99 % for 4 hours.<<<<HELP ME.
5 I checked the process in background ...all process related to LOL is running in the background.


regards...
REST IN PEACE------------>>>>>ME

Ah, sorry to hear you're still running into patching issues. :\

Since you're observing a failure after 32%, it means it's happening while the client is grabbing files from our patching servers. This issue is likely caused by an unstable connection to those servers, so I suggest working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure this isn't caused by bad local network settings.

Let me know if this worked. Also, be sure to reply directly to this comment so I'll receive a notification of your reply. ^.^

hi blade,
thank you...
I  sorted out the installation issue....but the joy was short live.....
I got the LOL interface , as I launched the game...i recieve a message stating Zlib.dll file missing  so cant start, I am back to reinstalling the game again...
<<<<R.I.P>>>  my efforts....LOL

This may have been caused by your manual deletion of folders and files in your last attempt to fix it. I actually recommend avoiding deleting files and folders inside the League directory unless absolutely necessary.

After you've reinstalled, let me know if you run into any other errors.

hi blade, 
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!GAME ON....!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!:)!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Thanks man, I restore files from recycle bins....
It was sorted out....
thankyou very much..
many blessing to u

Bugsplats indicate that a poor interaction is happening between your PC's hardware and the client. I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as it covers the most common solutions for this and should only take a few minutes.

Let me know if you still encounter these problems.

The issue is present on both my computers as well and it started only after patching to the latest version. At the moment I'm trying to repair the client, but the problem is definitely caused by your update, not by our machines.

Edit:

No luck, didn't help at all. I believe the bugsplat is caused by the fact that for whatever reason the background is set to warwicks login theme and not diana's.
